$description:
| What does this do? | Ensures self-service password reset is enabled for all users |
| Why should you use this? | Ensures all member users can reset their own passwords in Entra ID. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users will be required to provide additional contact information to enroll in self-service password reset. |
| Learn more | [Enable self-service password reset](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/authentication/tutorial-enable-sspr) |
